restriccion2: $$\dfrac{|\sum_{i \in E: c_i = j}\sum_{k:d \in P_k}x_{ik}g_i -\sum_{i \in E: c_i = j}\sum_{k:d \in P_k}x_{ik}(1-g_i)|}{\sum_{i \in E: c_i = j}\sum_{k:d \in P_k}x_{ik}} \leq \beta, \forall d \in D, \forall j \in C$$
restriccion3: $$\sum_{i \in E: c_i = j}\sum_{k:d \in P_k}x_{ik} \geq n_{min}z_{jd}, \forall j \in C, \forall d \in D$$
restriccion4: $$\sum_{i \in E: c_i = j}\sum_{k:d \in P_k}x_{ik} \leq n_{max}z_{jd}, \forall j \in C, \forall d \in D$$
restriccion5: $$\sum_{k:d \in P_k}\sum_{i \in E}x_{ik} \leq aforo, \forall j \in C, \forall d \in D$$
